website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Gear Fit is a great-looking wearable, but doesn't successfully reconcile its dual roles as activity tracker and smartwatch.
pros: The Gear Fit has a forward-looking design, many more extras than the average fitness band, and the ability to measure heart rate
Its curved AMOLED display looks fantastic, too
cons: The long display means text reads awkwardly on your wrist
The Fit only works with certain Samsung phones
Can’t load apps, so you’re stuck with the features included
And the price is high, so much so that you might consider a cheaper alternative or the same-priced, more full-featured Gear Neo

customer_reviews.title: Loved it in the beginning
customer_reviews.text: Loved it in the beginning. It worked well and communicated with my Samsung cell phone without problems. Loved that it would help me find my cell phone. Eventually though, I had to get a different phone and this watch doesn't link to my current phone. I still liked the watch and would have settled for it to just show time and count steps without getting the text message; however, it doesn't even do that anymore. I would not buy it again. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: DadOf2Boys

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this while it worked...purchased March 3rd, April 27th it no longer holds a charge. It started out holding a charge for 4 days, then last week it would barely hold a charge for one day, now, nothing. Very disappointing. Other things potential purchasers may want to know, the silver around the face of the watch is not very durable, I wore mine every day and the silver part is all scratched off (less than 2 months), I do a lot of outdoor activities so I am probably harder on it than the average person.
customer_reviews.author: Alley

customer_reviews.title: Good watch, but doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice watch. A lot cheaper than most. The battery lasted quite a while at first, then started only lasting a couple hours. After having it for two years it went completely out. It gets hot when charging and when I turn it on it says it is rebooting. It reboots for a few minutes, shuts off, comes back on to rebooting. It does that in a vicious cycle until it dies. All in all, it worked great but not worth it to only last a couple years not wearing it full time.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife she really loves this thing it was a bit of a pain to set it up you have to pay for the app or find a free one that works good with both your phone and watch she has a Moto phone so you can't use a Samsung app and match up but once we got it going all was good she loves she can see who's calling or texting or change her music even if her phone is not close by the battery life is good it last about a day in a half before charge
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!  NOT A US WARRANTY PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: The product description states that it is good for a US warranty, it is NOT. I tried to register this product on the Samsung site and it does not recognize the serial number. Samsung contacted me and told me that "the Gear Fit you are referring to doesn’t belong to Samsung US as a result the product cannot be registered on the Samsung US web site." This product is not a US product. So, that warranty is not going to be from the US. Hopefully this thing will not break down after 30 days. It it so much as hiccups I'm sending it back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Scharmann

customer_reviews.title: Professional courtesy
customer_reviews.text: I love it because it is paired with my Samsung Galaxy Note 5, so I know when I receive a call or text message. Before either I missed calls because my phone was out of earshot or the ringing disturbed others in the office and since I wasn't alerted, I didn't check regularly.. Now I am notified of incoming calls and text messages even though my phone is in my purse on vibrate and I can respond when I get back to my phone. I like that it measures my steps; however, it does not work on the treadmill. The charger is cheap plastic with a lip that breaks easily.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what all the poor press is about
customer_reviews.text: I will see if this watch had one Achilles heel it would be that the updates sometimes take the the watch offline and it needs to be rebooted from a hard reboot not a soft reboot over all the graphics the screen the display are great the ability to pair it with your phone is quick and easy for someone wanting to count their steps or exercise it's a great watch overall for the price point I think it's one of the better SmartWatches out there I think it's definitely pointed towards women or people who have very petite wrist just my opinion
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made/defective - dead after a few uses!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome device and a great complement to Samsung's S-Health.... WHEN IT WORKS!! It's a fitness device after all, no?? So after a FEW times wearing while biking, walking, hiking - it fails. No shocking exercising, it fails because of SWEAT. Is this thing supposed to be moisture resistant? YES, even when submerged. After a little sweat on the arm on a few hot days, the sensor got filled with moisture and the charging contacts corroded. JUNK. Too bad because I was really into using this thing. Otherwise it WAS nice, functionality and screen was nice and the battery lasted pretty long. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: CEB

customer_reviews.title: Love my Gear Fit!
customer_reviews.text: Love my gear fit I had a jawbone up and lost it. This is so much better! I thought it might be too bulky for my small wrists, but it isn't. It is very light and comfortable. I had a little trouble getting it to install on the Note 3 - it said incompatible when I went to the site the instructions gave. But it was compatible. Just install Samsung Health and then install Gear Manager from the accessory tab on that. I recently upgraded to Note 5 and it installed right away with that model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Irritated
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for 3.5 moths and batter is draining quicker I just make sure to charge it every two days. I love it though. Didn't know you could add apps to it until recently. I get lots of questions about it. Update:December 2015. I've had this watch for couple months now and I'm very upset. It started to reboot constantly to where it drains the battery. I tried plugging it in to my laptop but that didn't work. I contacted Samsung and they said the serial number is not in their system although I bought it from Amazon. They suggested we bought a knock off. I may never buy electronics from Samsung or Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loyal to Samsung, but disappointed w/this...
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed that this started to malfunction within 6 months. I typically LOVE Samsung products and choose this over the Fitbit because of how easy it connects to my phone. Wasn't long before the screen started freezing, the side button became unreliable/unresponsive, and the heart monitor stopped working altogether. Was so excited about this product that I bought two, one for my mom and they BOTH exhibited the same functionality issues within weeks of each other. I'm not the type to buy tech products just because...I feel like my money went down the drain on this product...twice.
customer_reviews.author: Alauna Speaks

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent for a dual device-smart watch and fitness device
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad a device. Notifications are excellent: All can be adjusted as necessary. Not a single notification is missed. It is lightweight and has a very crisp display. I have received many positive comments concerning it. Lovely color selection for the various watch faces that can be displayed. Works very well with the phone. The sync function is convenient. It should be remembered that it ONLY works with Samsung phones. S-Health is a nice app. It makes my day when I see the gold medal indicating that I have achieved the days goal. I would definitely purchase this device again.
customer_reviews.author: James Howard, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Promising product.  Promise broken.  Disappointed girl.
customer_reviews.text: This item was great when I got it, but it stopped working right after it was eligible for return, according to Amazon's return policy. Imagine that. Now it doesn't properly track my steps and randomly turns itself on and off. It pauses the pedometer whenever it likes. I have reset it and rebooted it, but it has just decided to quit, 33 days after purchase. What a ripoff. I wish I could either exchange it or get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: trugirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Battery life is good
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Battery life is good. I can go for about 6 days of use, no notifications active, before having to recharge the device. The email, text, and call notifications are good to have but really drain the battery. The only problem that I can tell you about is the design flaw of the wrist strap. The watch can easily come off when brushed up against a belt or if you're doing lifting or something active. I do hear that there is a fix for that though. Besides that, I would recommend this product. The lcd screen started flickering after a year and lost color. Maybe their newer products will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: DadReviews

customer_reviews.title: Great product great quality amazing a screen from Samsung
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I wasn't expecting less from Samsung I wish the battery life was a little bit longer but I can easily go two days without charging this device it doesn't have Quick Charge that is a little let down but what can you expect this is the first generation mine had a little bit I'm going to scratch right on top of the Samsung logo but not to worry about it since you can change the wristband I say that if you want to get into the feeling of having a smartwatch I think that's great way to
customer_reviews.author: Jose G.

customer_reviews.title: ok.would spend 15 $ more for good cond.fitgear.
customer_reviews.text: Fit gear works ok but pictures didn't show it has alot of damages more than expected.so it looks bad which is ready I wanted it .it looked cool and went with my phone.now I rarely use it cause come is all chipped. And face has scratches couldn't see till light is off.on watch.but 29.00 guess I should of waited u can get used great ones for 40 bucks .new condition.there everywhere.now.person did ship fast enough.so 3 stars.because of descriptoo.pics were false leading.
customer_reviews.author: mike b

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Gear Fit Accuracy
customer_reviews.text: It's only been 3 days, but if you have a Samsung phone this wearable is awesome. I used to be a Fitbit fan and just received the Charge HR and after a week it stopped responding so instead of exchanging it I wanted to try the Gear Fit and man I'm glad I did. It is so much more intuitive than the Charge HR. I know there are a lot of complaints about the accuracy of the heart rate so I tested mine up against a chest-strap monitor and if not worn too tight or too loose it was +/- 2 points so I'm very happy with those results. It is beautiful to boot. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: D. Staggs

customer_reviews.title: Finally Found the Perfect One for Me!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Gear Fit! Easy to use, I didn't need instructions at all. User friendly, picks up my steps and workouts, but not my general arm motions, so I can't cheat on my goals. If I want 10,000 step, I need to take 10,000 steps. My previous tracker would give me step counts for putting on makeup! This also allows me to get text messages, check phone calls and even tracks my sleep. I have 4 bands in different colors to match clothing and the bands are great. Easy in and out but NOT so easy as to pop the tracker out. I'd buy again and highly recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: imagesinthewind

customer_reviews.title: Gear Fit connects fine with my Galaxy S5
customer_reviews.text: Gear Fit connects fine with my Galaxy S5. I use the Gear Fit as a slim watch, fitness/exercise--pedometer, hiking, and sleep monitor, heart rate. I like the way it looks and works for the items I have identified in the note. The only is I have is the timeout. You can set the timeout for 5,10,30 seconds, 1 minute and 5 minutes. I have it set for 5 minutes and it timesout too quick. Becomes frustrating to raise your arm or push the on/off button to turn it back on. However, it must have something to do with the battery life. Otherwise, I am pleased with the Samsung Gear Fit.
customer_reviews.author: Sedona John

customer_reviews.title: keeps track of steps 100% correctly
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!!!!!! Keeps count of my steps perfectly. Maybe there has been an update since the reviews I read about it being off by quite a few steps. Did several trials today counting each of my steps and comparing it to the watch reset and repeat several times...spot on. Works awesome. Only complaint is that it will not sense when you fall asleep like other activity trackers you must set it and if you're like me you lay in bed for several minutes waiting to fall asleep. I purchased refurbished as a birthday gift to myself for 107.00 completely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I was wanting to replace my Jawbone Up and this fit the bill perfectly. It does everything the Up did and then some. All the uses it has when it comes to the phone is nice too. My phone ends up being hooked up to a 40 watt radio at work and streaming music. It's nice from to be able to see text messages when I'm 50 yards from my phone. Launching Pandora back up on my phone from that distance with the Gear Fit is nice too. (Current version of Pandora is crash prone). I'm looking forward to seeing how well the heart rate monitor works when I go on my next hike.
customer_reviews.author: Corwynder

customer_reviews.title: It felt like a major waste of time and energy
customer_reviews.text: Not to mention that I waited a long time to even receive the item. It felt like a major waste of time and energy. I had to download an app to even get it to work, then sync it with my S Health. It was an annoying hassle, that I got through. But soon after I got even more annoyed with it, the screen did not show my step progress when I opened it, I had to slide to a different screen to see that. And it was not tracking my steps. I walked around for a length of time and only had 18 steps recorded. I returned it the same day I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: The reason why I purchased this watch was because I ...
customer_reviews.text: The reason why I purchased this watch was because I kept missing phone calls with my phone being in my purse. I am not one of those people so "connected" to their phones that they keep checking it every 30 minutes. This watch helps me know when I have calls/messages, texts, tells me my steps (accurate??) and helps me keep tabs on my sleep .... or there lack of it. The fit is adjustable and the look is decent. I still wear my "jewelry" watch on my left wrist on this one on my right wrist, just as a tool, rather than a time piece.
customer_reviews.author: mlddc

customer_reviews.title: I recommend anyone looking for a smartwatch to consider this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother for Christmas and she is still using it 9 months later. She uses it to track her physical activity throughout the day and week. She also loves the locator function on this Fit because she is always misplacing her phone and with the touch of a button all is right again. She loses everything, so for her to actually still have the smartwatch shows that she has grown quite attached it. I recommend anyone looking for a smartwatch to consider this.
customer_reviews.author: Theo Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for Valentines day. It really is a very neat smart watch. It is capable of tracking heart rate, steps, and sleep. it also lets her know when she gets a notification such as texts, calls, and any other of her other apps that she allows to notify her. she really loves it. there are apps on the play store that you can download to your smart phone that allows you to put any picture as a wallpaper. custom clock screens and many others. This is definitely a win.
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so great!! I love this !! I originally bought this to use a pedometer, But have come to love all the other features on it! It fits on my wrist perfectly. I was worried about the size but it really is not a issue. I also bought some of the different colors bands so you can switch it up. I love that! The only "down" side(if there is any) is that it is not water proof. Its in only water resistant. I have washed dishes,face etc with it on. But have not showered or swam with it. I would def buy this product again!!! I love it! It pushes me to move more!
customer_reviews.author: jessica l iacono

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars because it does everything so well. I love it. A few times I have forgotten to turn off the sleep mode. It tracks everything very well. The 4 star is just for the thickness of the actual monitor. I have small wrists and it does look big on me. I have no problem with it coming off, which I though I would because there is not buckle. It has been bumped pretty hard and has not fallen off or come undone. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lycaena N.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty design, poor execution.
customer_reviews.text: Oh Samsung... I had such hope for you, but then you let me down. The screen on this is BEAUTIFUL - it is a curved OLED screen. As beautiful as it was, the face of this tracker was still too wide for my wrist. Wearing this correctly, it had big gaps between the edges of the face and my wrist. I hate that! Also, the wide screen was odd to use. The app left a lot to be desired too. This device is ultimately a let down - spend you money elsewhere! I just got the Fitbit Surge last month and it was the tracker I have been waiting for.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and affordable Smart Watch for Samsung
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived very mangled, held together with rubber bands, but it was fully functional. (this was a result of USPS problem, not Amazon) I use this device with my Samsung Galaxy S5 and it works very well. It fits me nicely, although I have ordered some band accessories to keep it safe when I wear it outside my home. The screen is bright and large, and it charges very quickly. I think this smart watch is very comparable to other devices that are much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great connected accessory. You can customize the background with your own picture through your phone, a nice little feature. The exercise feature is great, there's a coach for running that will tell you to increase / decrease / maintain your pace according to the goals you set. I just wish there were more exercise options besides Running, Cycling, Walking, and Hiking so you can track your heart rate and workout better. All around very useful device.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good decision
customer_reviews.text: I have a house full of Samsung products. Pros - ease of use, simplicity, text/calls/ and email access on the band, sleep tracker find my device and reminder rewards. And it's awfully SEXY Cons- Heart rate monitor is USELESS, Online app needs a lot of work regarding format, displaying information, and planning. Battery life between charges. (Every 2 days) All my cons can likely be fixed with a software update. Overall it does what I need
customer_reviews.author: trophygurl

customer_reviews.title: Would have been 5 stars - reboot loop
customer_reviews.text: My wife absolutely loved this as a gift. She has worn this non-stop and used every feature to the maximum. This would be a 5 star review except that after a month and a half it has now gone into an endless reboot loop. After doing some google searches this is apparently a known problem with no known solution. Unfortunately I have passed the 30 day window with Amazon for returning/replacing it. Now I need to find the original box for the warranty information and deal directly with Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Lawless

customer_reviews.title: ... a samsung phone so I thought it would be easy to set up and be able to use it ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I have a samsung phone so I thought it would be easy to set up and be able to use it easily with my phone. I like it, the only thing it you have to tell it when you start sleeping and when you wake up, so there were times where, according to it, I had slept 14 hours, because i forgot to turn off the sleep mode. I used to have a fitbit, and I didn't have to tell it when i was sleeping, somehow it just knew. But overall I like the Gear Fit
customer_reviews.author: K. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome love it.
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my Note 4, I purchased for the health tracking, and discovered all the useful apps. My favorite must have app is the Navigation app, which displays Google Maps on your wrist, a lot safer than looking down at your phone, last about 2-3 day on a charge depending on what you use. The only con is the band can unlatch and you could loose it. 5 stars if they fix the band, purchased after market Clasps. Compared to a Fit bit, way more features for about the same cost.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Good watches
customer_reviews.text: This Watch does more then most think it does. Its very nice but informative. What i mean is you can see text messages and Emails and who is calling you. you can send a quick reply to text messages only but notto email, which is fine for me. but for a smart watch it works really well. I bought one for me and my wife and we both love them. We have Samsung Note 4 smart phones and have not one connection issue to date.
customer_reviews.author: Srelles Tech

customer_reviews.title: THIS DOESN'T WORK
customer_reviews.text: This fitness band is a ripoff. IT will not pair with anything but a Samsung phone. I have an android phone, and it will pair with a 3rd party app, but it doesn't work correctly. Just buy literally anything else, because this thing is a waste of money. Why would you make a fitness band that only works with a specific phone. Even the Apple watch works with Android. I am at a loss of words and cash. I will never buy another Samsung watch again.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Desormeau

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Gave my old wearable to my wife. (CUBOT). The wrist band needs another layer of securement. But I'm happy I don't have to have a separate app to use it like the Cubot. Don't get me wrong, the Cubot for being cheap, isn't terrible. I have now stopped wearing it because the cradle is too much. If it was USB...then maybe.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Merriel

customer_reviews.title: I reviewed this product earlier and was disappointed that there were no instructions on how to operate ...
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed this product earlier and was disappointed that there were no instructions on how to operate my new smart watch. The seller contacted me promptly and gave me a website to connect to. I was very happy! Thanks for following up, that shows how much your customers mean to you. Now I'm all smiles because I just love my new smart watch and all the things it can do, it's amazing, it's just like magic!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna Anna

customer_reviews.title: A Fun and Functional Gadget
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love my Gear fit! People ask all the time what it is and are amazed with everything it can do! It is a little off on calculating mileage ( about half a mile off), and it doesn't calculate at all when I ride a bike, but I love the step count, the heart rate monitor, the alarm, the ability to read and answer texts, the caller ID and the ability to change the background is a fun bonus! I had a Fit Bit which was okay, but the Gear Fit is way cooler!
customer_reviews.author: hospicern

customer_reviews.title: I like that it has a stopwatch
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has a stopwatch, pedometer, I can shower with it and go running and have it track my time. It hooks up to my phone so I can use my phone's GPS, which is fine. But battery drainer. It sinks, but you can turn off the Bluetooth connection, which helps save battery (obviously). I just wish having it connected didn't drain my phone battery so much. But great fit. Doesn't get in the way. Love the personalization as well! Keep it up, Samsung! Picture is having it after 4 months or so. Does get pretty worn of you care about it, but don't... Haha.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: notifications are a breeze and very easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: You have to manually engage any tracking software (pedometer, etc) which is incredibly inconvenient. Wish I had known that prior to purchase. On the other hand, notifications are a breeze and very easy to follow. Somewhat difficult to have to move your head in an odd angle to read the watch easily, though.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: I'm getting myself one now!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. This is our first smart watch, and although it's not officially Android Wear, Samsung did a great job on this device. Battery lasts her 2 days, when she forgets to charge it overnight. It's got a lot of great features for a sporty watch. My only gripe is that the Samsung Gear software on the phone occasionally freezes up when trying to change the background picture on the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel

customer_reviews.title: Another Samsung Great
customer_reviews.text: Great device. It was what i wanted it to be. To many people are on here posting about how it lacks features and everything; all i have to say is read before you buy. Samsung make a great device and it works like it should. If you think this device is lacking then you should look at fitbit and jawbone. Once you try those you will really like this device. Not only do you get a display on this device, but unlike other device this one offers more features at just $10 to 20$ more.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Really useful as long as you don't mind a DAILY charge.
customer_reviews.text: The battery is just too low. If I'm using it as a sleep monitor having to charge it every single day is kind of difficult as most people charge their connected devices at night. I'm sure Samsung has done better on their newer models but this one just was more inconvenient than it should have been. Great built in and customizable features though.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy!
customer_reviews.text: The watch has some fantastic features and pairs well with the Samsung phone; unfortunately, my watch stopped working after five months. Prior to its untimely "death," I would have given it a four-star review for its compatibility with the phone. Like others have mentioned, it is not a great step counter, and when I used it for running, it gave inaccurate mile times and distances. I would not recommend this watch to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly V.

customer_reviews.title: I love being able to see when I am at work ...
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to see when I am at work how many steps I don't take.... It motivates me to get up and take breaks. I really love the notifications I get, I can see when someone is calling or texting when my phone is on silent (at work) or when I am around the house. It allows me to have distance from my phone but still be aware if there is an urgent issue.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Farnsworth

customer_reviews.title: Great alarm clock to not wake up spouse. Survived the washing machine and dryer.
customer_reviews.text: I only use this as an alarm clock and sometimes to control my music player. Works great for those things. Heart rate monitor doesn't seem great. After owning it for 5 days I accidentally put it through the washing machine, and the dryer. It totally rebooted itself and lost all data somehow, but it works fine. I give it 5 stars for surviving the wash.
customer_reviews.author: DCpl

customer_reviews.title: Progress has been made!
customer_reviews.text: I waited a long time to buy this. When it first came out there were a lot of complaints about the software. it's rebooted on me twice, but other than that, it's lovely. I think the steps are accurate (I had a Fitbit Flex and a Jawbone Up), but what I really like is that it doesn't do steps when I'm driving. Tracking sleep is very easy. Notifications for texts messages and email are amazing. There's nothing about this I don't like.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen

customer_reviews.title: Swine
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly as its supposed to do. The drawback is that it is limited (i.e. chained) to only Samsung products. I enjoyed it for the month I wore it. Though I believe the pedometer overestimated frequently, it still was great. I ended up going back to my Flex because in syncs with my food diary app, while this one doesn't. It is an excellent smartwatch; but not so great fitness watch. When Samsung unchains it, i will try again.
customer_reviews.author: Scion Selfie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I expedited shipping for this product and when I received it the battery was dead so I had to charge it. One it was fully charged, I noticed that there was a black spot on the watch's screen which covered up what I needed to see. Needless to say, I had to return the watch. I checked tracking and it says that the watch was delivered yesterday. Just waiting on my refund. I was so excited because I lost my other watch and wanted to get back to counting my steps.
customer_reviews.author: Avid.Online.Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I don't really hate the product
customer_reviews.text: I don't really hate the product, but I can't give it anymore than a 1 star. I am sure this is a great product. I was very excited to receive it. The only problem was I could not use it because if it said that you could only use it if you had a Samsung phone, which I don't have - I didn't see that. I was disappointed and had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in April of 2015 and loved everything about it until one day I woke up and put it on and it wouldn't stop vibrating. Now I'm stuck with an expensive product that I can't use. I googled it and numerous other people have experienced the same issue. So although I loved it when it worked it no longer works after less than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: This was a great addition to my samsung S6 edge
customer_reviews.text: This was a great addition to my samsung S6 edge! I love that it interacts with the phone the way it does but it also functions by itself. I use all the features it has to offer. The only small issue is the size, I have quite petite wrists and it looks a little bit big on my wrist but it works!
customer_reviews.author: Beaker07

customer_reviews.title: what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: This is everything i was looking for in a pedometer. I can't say all this does. Besides the pedometer, u have notification of text, weather, calls with preset messages if u not able to answer. U keep track of your sleep and workouts. The list is long and there are 3rd parry apps too. The only downside is the activity tracker by samsung sucks. Overall its a 5star for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ketotarian_king

customer_reviews.title: A few months after purchasing this the watch started freezing ...
customer_reviews.text: A few months after purchasing this the watch started freezing and would not reset. A replacement was sent after a lot of back and forth but the same issue started shortly after the new one arrived. I will never buy another one again
customer_reviews.author: Randall Earby

customer_reviews.title: ... to b a big issue with these its no good to me if cant use it
customer_reviews.text: it will not stop rebooting ive not gotten to use it much due to that ive tried everything it seems to b a big issue with these its no good to me if cant use it
customer_reviews.author: missouri girl

customer_reviews.title: This Watch is an awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I love it. I love it. I wear it all the time, it allows me to shut off alarms on my phone even if I am several rooms away from the device. It works just as advertised, and there are a lot of 'extras' of which I was unaware when I bought it that make it even better than I had hoped. I would recommend it to anyone as a companion device for an Android phone. Again, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharron Dupree

customer_reviews.title: Great watch - poor heart rate monitor
customer_reviews.text: More of a toy than a serious fitness tool. Yes, you can get email alerts on the tiny screen, but your phone is nearby, so why not slip your phone in a pocket? The heart rate monitor is inconsistant. Far better to get a chest strap for your heart rate and have acrurate feedback. I loved the specifications, but was disappointed with the product. To me it is more of a gadget than a solution.
customer_reviews.author: Straight-Talk

customer_reviews.title: Gear  Fit
customer_reviews.text: I'v had my Gear Fit for over a year now and I have really enjoyed it. In the last two or three months, it has formed a black dot that keeps getting worse. It is located at the bottom of the face of the watch. It looks like the black screen has leaked and keeps getting larger. So far I can see the watch, I just hope it doesn't grow and fill the screen. Has anyone else had this to happen?
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Gear Fit Watch
customer_reviews.text: love my Samsung Gear fit Watch. I have had several people ask me is that a fitbit? I workout with it, I wear it when I am not working out, so I cam count my steps, and calories burned. It is one of the Best purchases I have made. Would highly recommend. AAAAA+++++++++
customer_reviews.author: Justine Blankenbeckler

customer_reviews.title: Might be worth a square trade warranty.  Reboot problems common.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given a better review, but I just started the return process for this device. After having this since valentines day,i had no complaints until yesterday when out of the blue it started a reboot loop from which I was not able to recover the device. I read several online support forums trying to figure out what this was. It is a common issue with some devices. I hope my next one last a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Really great to have
customer_reviews.text: This is great for what it comes with for the price. I am a big guy so it doesn't fit on my wrists very well. But my wife is the one I gave it to and she loves having it. Checks text messages, answers calls, tracks fitness, and controls music. I don't think it's worth paying full price for this product, but even the used one we bought works wonderfully and is without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew K.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Material Choice, Unreliable Software.
customer_reviews.text: Paint started chipping off of the silver band on the outside after about a month. No clue why you wouldn't just use something more durable on a watch designed for someone who is active a lot. Also began constantly rebooting itself around the same time, contacted Samsung and they can't confirm I own it since it's an "International" purchase. After a bit of research this glitch is a common problem and would require me to ship them the damn thing back regardless. It was a fun experience while it lasted but I think I'm done buying Samsung after this, more for how unhelpful their customer service has been than anything else. Bad product, even worse service.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Barreto

customer_reviews.title: Still one of the best on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. Takes a beating. Mine is starting to look a little bad now but still works fine. Had it for nearly a year now. Locksup occasionally, put it on charge and be patient. (Off and On charge has worked for me)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in overall performance and consistency of device...
customer_reviews.text: Switched from the Fit Bit to the Samsung Gear Fit. However, I'm rather disappointed the overall functionality of my Gear Fit device. Experienced sporadic issues with the unit, including loosing steps, device reseting itself, to now no longer powering on. Since my device is under warranty, returned to Samsung. Hope that they repair the faulty device without excuses or any additional charges
customer_reviews.author: CECarter

customer_reviews.title: like everything but the watchband
customer_reviews.text: All the bluetooth functionality works great, & the screen is very customizable. Not too large, so it feels feminine enough for me and not clunky & huge. My only issue is the band, I just really wish there was a way to add your own watchband that was sleeker (maybe leather or metal) because the plastic just looks cheap. Asus zenwatch does this well but it is SO big it will not work for a smaller lady wrist without looking ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Hillenbrand

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this item unless you
customer_reviews.text: This watch does not work, I returned it to Samsung for repair and they will not honor their warranty. They just returned it and included a code BER. Did not even bother to tell us what the code stood for . Do not buy this item unless you want to get screwed.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Williams

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Device - Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest. It has many, many more functions than just fitness. I have people ask me about it all the time and Samsung keeps adding more features. Paid $50 more than for a Fit Bit and it has way, way more features. You do need to have a Samsung phone to take full advantage but hey I kicked the Apple habit a year ago and have never regretted it.
customer_reviews.author: Bert S.

customer_reviews.title: Everything worked like advertised, pretty straight forward and simple
customer_reviews.text: Everything worked like advertised, pretty straight forward and simple. As a fitness watch it's slightly inaccurate if you're looking for precision. If you plan on using it as a simple pedometer it works great and it has the ability to see your notifications and work with your smart phone. The only limitation is that it works best with a Samsung phone.
customer_reviews.author: Thaeyo

customer_reviews.title: Both of them really liked it, and the build quality seemed quite impressive
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to my brother, who then sold it to my other brother (because he's extremely inconsiderate). Both of them really liked it, and the build quality seemed quite impressive, but I didn't have much time to tinker with it. From what I saw it deserves a 5/5 for the price and build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Sechrist

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea but does nothing too well
customer_reviews.text: Nice idea but does nothing too well. It's more likely worth $49.99 or less. It was a disappointment on many levels and failed many times in general. Samsung should recall it and focus on something that really kicks ass and stop making us waste time buying and returning their ideas! The software, especially connected to my Note 4, leaves much to be desired...
customer_reviews.author: R Mauro

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I bought it and it came defective. It is stuck on a reboot loop. To get a refund I have to mail it back and I have to pay for shipping. Not worth the hassle. Save your money and don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Tapia

customer_reviews.title: Loved my fit at first
customer_reviews.text: Loved my fit at first. Now it won't stop rebooting. Tried Samsung customer support online and they couldn't help and referred me to the phone number. after about a dozen attempts over the period of a month I finally got a live person they were of minimal assistance. I am left with a product that does not work and no rma to return it for repair or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Reboot Loop Warning. Be prepared to be on your own.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a Christmas gift for my wife. Last night with just less than 2 months of use it went into the reboot loop. No real support on Samsung sites so I'm on my own trying other fixes found on the net. What a pain in the rear this thing turned out to be.
customer_reviews.author: Ed S

customer_reviews.title: C'mon buddy. Get your squad right!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Bought it for work so I don't have to take my s5 out of my pocket to see every message or email. Not five stars because it came with a big gouge in the screen, pretty deep. I thought that the geek squad certification would have kept things like that from occurring... Or at least slap a good screen protector on it, I would have probably never even noticed.
customer_reviews.author: B. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: they all love their Fit Bits
customer_reviews.text: Gave this item to my daughter for her birthday, my son and future daughter-in-law have one, they all love their Fit Bits, she loves it and wears it everyday, it arrived as expected, also we got the interchangeable bands with this so she could be fashion forward, I have no complaints and am thinking of getting one for myself!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great if you don't need the heart rate monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product if you don't need to measure your heart rate. Heart rate monitor would not work most of the time and when it did, it was very inaccurate. I purchased this strictly for the heart rate monitor due to a medical condition, but sadly it didn't work properly. Love all the other features and it worked perfectly with my Samsung Galaxy phone.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra L Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: This is an OK tracker but what's the point of having HR monitoring where you have to stand still to get a reading? So if I wanted to monitor my heart rate while on the treadmill I needed to step off to do that. I like the Samsung program and it worked well with my Galaxy 5 but the HR thing was a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Beanie&Pie

customer_reviews.title: I've not even had this for 9 months and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I've not even had this for 9 months and it spontaneously died tonight for no apparent reason. The "warranty" is nonexistent so sadly, this has become an expensive learning curve. Sorry Samsung but I won't be buying any more of your products......way too expensive for something that works for such a short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: justareadingcat

customer_reviews.title: If you like Samsung, you'll love GearFit!
customer_reviews.text: The best-looking almost-smartwatch, slim profile for a gal with a small wrist. I like the text and appointment notifications, but I wish the Samsung S-fit app interfaced with more of the existing fitness software like MyFitnessPal. Display and customization of the Gear Fit watch make it a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Gottlieb

customer_reviews.title: Samsung made simple.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great device, everything at your fingertips. Alerts and more. It can be styled your way, Use the ones built in or use your on photos. The apps for this device are decent however they are few. It is simple, easy to use. The only drawback is the silver trim on the bezel it will eventually chip away. Still a great device.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great deal at $100
customer_reviews.text: Great deal at $100. $200 might have been too much. I have a note 5 and I am getting text, call and email notifications. If the battery could last another day or two, and charge faster than it does, it would be a big help.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Won't replace my Fitbit, but I like it for other features
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but it is too easy to knock off your wrist. Should have a regular buckle like Fitbit. Also. the heart rate monitor is difficult and slow to activate. But the display is large and bright and I love the ability to control music playback right on my wrist, and see text messages immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Arvie

customer_reviews.title: Gear Fit-Great fit.love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love my smart watch, easy setup, works super with my Galaxy Note 4. I have a very small wrist it fits perfectly. Fast shipping. Great product. I n would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love my Samsung Gear Fit Smart Watch. I wear it all the time. I only have to charge it every 3 days. It tracks all my steps better than the one i was using before. I don't have to worry about where I left it because it's always on my wrist. I have recommended this to my friends. =) Good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: i would buy again, but one that'll sync to my phone
customer_reviews.text: the device its self is great super light great design great features, but i had trouble sync in it to my phone i called samsung and after they told me to go to best buy to find the issues that's why i returned. Later after extensive research found it was not compatible with my s6 edge
customer_reviews.author: alex sobol

customer_reviews.title: POS just reboots itself every 5 seconds.
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy this peice of junk, after just less than 10 mos of wear, it went into a continuous reboot loop - none of the techniques listed online work to resolve the issue. It just reboots continually until its runs down the battery, when you recharge it, all it does it do it for hours on end again. A useless little brick.
customer_reviews.author: Gauge14iv

customer_reviews.title: Rebooting Gear Fit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my Gear Fit in March and I loved it. I loved everything about it, the functions, that I'm able to change the background picture and everything. I'm upset because after charging when I turned it on, it kept rebooting itself, Ive contacted Samsung and they to me how to reset it and that didn't work. I'm wondering how to contact the seller to see how I can get this problem fixed or if I have to go through Samsung to fix my gear fit? I loved my gear fit and I want it fixed please.
customer_reviews.author: Shiquita

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I use it daily and it is great. I tested the heart rate with the doctor's office machine today and it was spot on!! I like that I don't have to have my phone in my hand or pocket all the time and it tells me when a text or call comes in and who it is..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wearable
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife and she loves it. She doesn't even work out or go to the gym, it's just really convenient. Especially if you work a fast paced job where its important to not waste time checking your phone only to find out it's an annoying notification or that friend that only contacts you when they need a ride or money.
customer_reviews.author: Ken W.

customer_reviews.title: But I do love that I can read my textes and see my ...
customer_reviews.text: I mistakenly delete one of my runs and can not add it back in. I only had it for two weeks and on this morning run it froze up on me. then later in the day it stopped counting my steps. I had to restart it twice today. Luckly I did not lose the data these times. The band has come unclipped twice almost lost it both times luckly found it on the ground once and was stuck in my shirt the other time. But I do love that I can read my textes and see my cell phone calls coming in. And it did good on both my bicycle rides, on miles and time.
customer_reviews.author: robert johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not indestructible, but the best product of its kind
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for almost 6 months. It works great, but on the edges of the display, the the silver/metal part has been scratched up a bit. Regardless, the waterproof part is still true (which makes it super easy to clean!). I really appreciate all the features it has over the fitbit (like that it tells me when I get a text or a call), and the heart rate monitor has been really useful. Great product, couldn't think of a better substitute.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Clatterbuck

customer_reviews.title: this watch is great.
customer_reviews.text: I don't use for true fitness. But, for seeing text (option for quick saved responses), viewing email headers, rejecting calls, using the pedometer, and being able to change songs and headset volume while cycling without pulling my phone out of the back of my jersey...this watch is great.
customer_reviews.author: AmZshopper

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: I have now been through 2 of these. The first one started rebooting on its own after two weeks. Amazon did a fantastic job of replacing that one. The second one started sending SOS messages on its own then shut off for good 20 days after the return window closed. It was a great watch before it died though.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight wearable smart watch
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a Moto 360 and didn't like how bulky it was. I got this fit and it works great with my Galaxy S5. It is light weight and it has some minor custom things such as a screen saver and applications for it. The only downfall to it is there's no mic for replying to text but that doesn't bother me. I used it for tracking my sleep and fitness routine. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quit working in less than 2 months.  Has continual Reboot Loop that won't stop!  Don't Buy!!  Common Problem!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this smartwatch as a Christmas gift for my Mom. On Jan 31 it stopped working. The watch goes into a continual reboot loop and won't come out of it. We tried everything including following on-line instructions to stop the loop--which didn't work. Apparently this is a big problem experienced by many folks! When we attempted to return the watch via Amazon we found out the warranty was only good until Jan 31! So now we're stuck with an expensive watch that doesn't work anymore after barely a month of ownership! My parents love Samsung products as they are generally pretty good--the exception is this watch! I recommend you do not purchase it!
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: NO WARRANTY! and A PIECE OF JUNK WATCH
customer_reviews.text: My watch is stuck in a rebooting loop and no longer works. I contacted the seller and they said since I have had it for longer than 90 days they cant do anything about it. I contacted Samsung and they looked up the Serial Number and guess what... its out of warranty. Just my luck, so now I am tuck with a useless watch that I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Dinkel

customer_reviews.title: Better than FitBit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace my FitBit. I love this. Not only does it track my sleep, steps but I get text messages and can reply with template messages that I sign up and also reject calls. There is applications you can also install for calendar and alerts.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette McD

customer_reviews.title: Love this smart watch!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second gear fit as the first came off at a UofO football game and was lost forever! I love this little watch as it isn't bulky and keeps me connected to my phone. I'm able to answer texts with quick messages and see who's calling.
customer_reviews.author: leannwoo

customer_reviews.title: I rate this a four because it has two flaws ...
customer_reviews.text: I rate this a four because it has two flaws one you have to take it off to charge it so there goes that time without tracking you steps or exercise and two it doesn't automatically start your sleep test/ scanning you have to manually start it. So what if you fall asleep you just missed out on that analysis.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

product_meta.title: Samsung Gear Fit Smart Watch, Black (US Version)
product_meta.description: The Samsung Gear Fit is the first curved, Super AMOLED wearable device for active lifestyles. Empower your fitness with real-time coaching and heart rate monitoring without sacrificing style or connectivity. Wherever your day takes you, Gear Fit matches any occasion with interchangeable bands and screens so you can look and feel your best. Achieve your fitness goals and improve your overall wellness with smarter monitoring and motivation Interchangeable bands with multiple options. Always-on activity tracking keeps track of your activities throughout the day and is prepared for any adventure with its dust and water resistant protection. Light and durable with a curved Super AMOLED display.
feature_bullets: 24/7 Wearable: Always-on activity tracking keeps track of your activities throughout the day and is prepared for any adventure with its dust and water resistant protection (IP67). Light and durable with a curved Super AMOLED display
Personalized Fitness Motivator: With the Heart Rate Sensor, Samsung Gear Fit gives you real time coaching to actively support and motivate you to achieve your fitness goals
Simple Interaction: Samsung Gear Fit allows you to easily control basic functions, such as, reject calls with messages, quick reply to messages and control alarms
Connected Notification: Samsung Gear Fit equips you with instant notifications of emails, SMS, incoming calls, & 3rd party apps to keep you connected

Compatible with Samsung Galaxy S5 / Galaxy Grand 2 / Galaxy Note 3 / Galaxy Note 3 Neo / Galaxy Note 2 / Galaxy S4 / Galaxy S3 / Galaxy S4 Zoom / Galaxy S4 Active / Galaxy S4 mini /Galaxy Mega 6.3 / Galaxy Mega 5.8 / Galaxy Note 10.1 (2014 Edition) / Galaxy NotePRO (12.2) / Galaxy TabPRO (12.2/10.1/8.4) [Compatible device models to be further expanded]

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars2,236 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
specifications.Additional Features: Light and durable, Heart rate monitor, Wearable tech, Gear fit, Fitness tracker, Gear fitness, Jawbone, Pedometer, Fit Bit, Fitness bracelet
